item.description:
A driving range is an area where golfers can practice their swing. It can also be a recreational activity itself for amateur golfers or when enough time for a full game is not available.

(In simple words - You have to swing the club and hit the ball as far as you can :) No experience required)

Players may borrow the club from the golf place.

Bucket Sizes

Mediumâ€‹ $6 (50 balls)
Large $9 (80 balls)
Jumbo $13 (120 balls)

Place
http://www.stonemeadowgolf.com/index.html

YouTube video for Driving Range
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sz-Z7ayoSEU

We can plan this even on weekdays.
item.name: Golf Driving range (For Beginners)
